title: LFP Looking for another skilled bronze player to get out of ELO hell with
body:
Hey I really don't play ranked much any more because It annoys me too much. I'm bronze 4 but i feel like I could definitely play with much higher ranks.. I regularly play normals with people gold and above. I'm wanting a Duo Partner who is in a similar type of position so we can play some ranked games and at least know that 2 people on the team aren't terrible haha. 

My role skill is in the follow order from best to least good.
Jung/Mid/Sup/ADC/Top

I like to play the game for fun over anything but It would be nice to be able to have something to show for it. *incoming lame cliche saying* lets do it, and we will carry each other through. haha.

replies.body: Means skilled for a bronze. Thanks for coming in and commenting for no dam reason.

> [{quoted}](name=MasterCheese,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=GW2QhjPE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-27T11:44:35.208+0000)
>
> Means skilled for a bronze. Thanks for coming in and commenting for no dam reason.

Was p3 last season before decay. Only just started playing ranked again on my main account.
I've got a couple of smurfs I've still got to do placements on if you want to duo this week, add me on this acct and we can go from there if you want. I've only got ADC's on the smurfs though.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=GW2QhjPE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-27T11:09:46.044+0000)
>
> "skilled"

Ethugs acting like they were never in bronze when they started playing.

Sure bud, I'm in your boat. I'll add you tomorrow (Can't add you now cause I uninstalled my client in frustration a couple of days ago, after I dropped to B3, haha).

Edit: Also we have somewhat unaligned role preferences, which is good.
hey I am diamond league player, I will duo with you mate, just add me
